conbody.p: The Per Session plan gives you unlimited testing minutes per session. One session allows you to run one sequence of tests, for as long as you need. The number of sessions you purchase is the maximum number of parallel tests you can execute. You can use the purchased number of sessions as many times as you want within your billing cycle.

For example, if you purchase 3 sessions, you will have 3 parallel test executions. You can execute 3 parallel tests at maximum for as long as you need, as many times as you want within your billing cycle.
